title: Hungry Zone Food Api Project
about: You can use the test API key 1 during development of your app or for educational use(see test links below)However you must apply for a key a production API key via email if releasing publicly on an appstore.The test key may be revoked at any time if abused.

fetaures.power: MealDB Api Used for Show Food Category And Also Show Category Wise Food.
This website has a search feature. You can search for any kind of food name you Like.
You can Add To Cart any kind of Food.

title: Best Watch Shop Website
about: This is a niche site for influencing people to buy QualityFull Watches. User's can signup/login here and buy neccessary goods from the site. I've implemented admin panel too. Not but the list, this task was given by Programming hero as the final assignment.

fetaures.power: With this web app, users can see watches, buy them and see their order item.
They have a login method and also an admin login process.
They also have an admin dashboard and user dashboard. Users can see their product and can make a website review.
Admin panel (All Product, Delete Product, Add Product, Edit Product).

title: Travel-Guru (A Tour Booking Site)
about: This site is about a Tour Package Booking System. We take all the responsibilities of our tourists and take order from this site. It's a task of assignment 11 given by programming hero. I've used my own idea to generate this UI as well as functionalities.

fetaures.power: An User can see the stunning tour packages which will be loaded from Mongdb.
User can order any package and his/her data will be saved on the database.
User can see his/her individual orders in my orders section and cancel any order too.
Admin can see all the orders of all users and can cancel or approve any order any time.
